mapper.update: update T_HAIRSHOP set shop_regular=#{shop_regular}, shop_address=#{shop_address}, shop_phone=#{shop_phone}, shop_start=#{shop_start}, shop_end=#{shop_end}, shop_image=#{shop_image}, shop_intro=#{shop_intro}, shop_tag=#{shop_tag} where shop_seq=#{shop_seq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_HAIRSHOP (shop_name, shop_register, shop_id, shop_pw, shop_address, shop_intro, shop_image, shop_start, shop_end, shop_phone, shop_regular, shop_tag) VALUES (#{shop_name}, #{shop_register}, #{shop_id}, #{shop_pw}, #{shop_address}, #{shop_intro}, #{shop_image}, #{shop_start}, #{shop_end}, #{shop_phone}, #{shop_regular}, #{shop_tag})
mapper.select: SELECT a.temp_seq, b.staff_seq, b.staff_nickname, a.temp_start, a.temp_end, a.temp_memo, c.shop_regular FROM T_HAIRSHOP AS c LEFT JOIN T_TEMPDAY AS a ON a.shop_seq = c.shop_seq LEFT JOIN T_STAFF AS b ON a.staff_seq = b.staff_seq WHERE c.shop_seq = #{shop_seq}
mapper.insert: insert into t_tempday_staff(staff_seq, temp_start, temp_end, temp_memo) values (#{staff_seq}, #{temp_start}, #{temp_end}, #{temp_memo})
insert into t_tempday_shop(shop_seq, temp_start, temp_end, temp_memo) values (#{shop_seq}, #{temp_start}, #{temp_end}, #{temp_memo})
